remark.p: Assistant Director of the Radiation Laboratory, MIT; member of the Board of Trustees, the RAND Corporation, from May 14, 1948; Chairman of the Ford Foundations from March 1951; Head of the Strategic Missile Evaluation Committee or “Teapot Committee,” from June 16, 1953 to February 8, 1954; Head of Security Resources Board of Office of Defense Mobilization which issued “Deterrence-Survival in the Nuclear Age” from April 1957
